mapper.select: select stu_id,stu_name,score,test_id from archive_test_score where deleted = 0 and test_id in (select id from archive_weight_assess_test where deleted = 0 and course_id = #{courseId}) order by stu_id
select stu_id,stu_name,score,test_id from archive_test_score where test_id = #{examId}
SELECT score,test_name from archive_test_score a left join archive_weight_assess_test b on b.id =a.test_id where b.course_id=#{courseId} and a.stu_id=#{stuId} and a.deleted=0

select SUM(d.score*d.weight) as score,d.name from (SELECT score,b.test_name,stu_name,b.weight,c.name,assess_id from archive_test_score a left join archive_weight_assess_test b on b.id =a.test_id LEFT JOIN archive_assess c on c.id=assess_id
where b.course_id=#{courseId} and a.stu_id=#{stuId} and a.deleted=0 )d GROUP BY d.name
